caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. PATRICK I. HANATO,

court.center: Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawaii.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIRST CIRCUIT (Cr. No. 05-1-0725)
opinion.opinion_byline:
By: WATANABE, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Recktenwald, C.J., Watanabe, and Nakamura, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the Summary Disposition Order filed on July 22, 2008 is hereby corrected as follows:
On page 1 in the caption, "CIRCUIT" shall be added at the end of the line so that the line reads as follows:
APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIRST CIRCUIT
The Clerk of the Court is directed to make the aforementioned correction to the original order and take all necessary steps to notify the publishing agencies of this correction.
